CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y     curl     git     gnupg     apt-transport-https     wget &&     apt-get clean && apt-get --yes --quiet autoremove --purge &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
